attributes.action: Visit the front line troops in Afghanistan using the road vehicles that our soldiers have to use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that to reassure the families of our armed forces in Afghanistan, Gordon Brown should visit the front line troops by means of the road vehicles that he says are adequate and safe.  Helicopters should not be used as they are committed or stored elsewhere

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
